name: Shanghai Interscholastic Ethics Bowl Online
body:
# Warm welcome to all judges, moderators, and teams participating in the Shanghai Interscholastic Ethics Bowl _Online_! 

## General Resources for Everyone
[Click here for the rules](https://docs.qq.com/pdf/DQkh3cEtZdGV3bW1K)
> Please note that presentation time will be set to 6 minutes.  

[Click here for a short video](https://youtu.be/HrGKhTmAoQI) created by the Ethics Bowl China which sketches the EB rules.  
[Click here for the case set](https://docs.qq.com/pdf/DQkpaZURnVUdyRm1m)  

## Resources for judges
[Click here for judges training video 1](https://youtu.be/b4Eg1w5Ht_4) created by the South Carolina HSEB.  
> This wouldn't be necessary if you've already very familiar with the **rules** and **judges guidelines (in the rules document)**  

[Click here for judges training video 2](https://youtu.be/EmRjAI4lhvo) produced for the Michigan HSEB.  
> This one provides a case as an example, **recommended**.  

[Click here for judges marking key](https://docs.qq.com/pdf/DQkJIR0NyZGh3UURz)   
> **You need to print these out!**  

[Click here for the Judging Criteria](https://docs.qq.com/pdf/DQmluenB5SnJFSUJB) 
> **This criteria would also be helpful to have printed out as well.**  

## Resources for moderators
[Click here for the Moderator Script](https://docs.qq.com/pdf/DQnNvSFBncWF2clBS)   
> 1. Print out script to use at the event.  
> 2. Make sure you have a timer/stopwatch with you. (and a coin)  
> 3. Two days before the event you will receive a powerpoint for screenshare and the questions to ask the students for each case.
